item.title: Leslie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor. " -- Betty Friedan

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Frank Kaiser
item.description: "Yes, we praise women over 40 for a multitude of reasons. Unfortunately, it's not reciprocal. For every stunning, smart, well-coiffed, hot woman over 40, there is a bald, paunchy relic in yellow pants making a fool of himself with some 22-year old waitress. Ladies, I apologize. For all those men who say, "Why buy the cow when you can get the milk for free?", here's an update for you. Nowadays 80% of women are against marriage. Why? Because women realize it's not worth buying an entire pig just to get a little sausage!" -- Frank Kaiser

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "Men should think twice before making widowhood women's only path to power." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Leslie add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Leslie add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally. " -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Leslie add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "i carry your heart with me(i carry it in my heart)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon
